title: happy
question: How happy and satisfied were you with your day today?
explanation: Rate your overall happiness and satisfaction today from 0 (not at all happy/satisfied) to 10 (extremely happy/satisfied). Consider any events or interactions that may have affected your mood when answering this question.

title: sad
question: How would you rate your level of sensitivity and sadness today?
explanation: Rate your level of sensitivity and sadness today from 0 (not at all sensitive/sad) to 10 (very sensitive/sad). Consider any events or interactions that may have affected your mood.

title: frustrated
question: How would you rate your level of frustration and agitation today?
explanation: Rate your level of frustration and agitation today from 0 (not at all) to 10 (very much). Consider any events or interactions that may have affected your mood.

title: stress
question: How satisfied were you stressed do you feel today?
explanation: Rate your level of stress today from 0 (not at all) to 10 (extremely). Consider any events or situations that may have contributed to your stress.

title: sleep
question: How would you rate the amount and the quality of your sleep?
explanation: Rate your level of sleep today from 0 (very poor) to 10 (very good). This includes any naps taken during the day.

title: nutrition
question: How satisfied are you with your nutrition today?
explanation: Rate your satisfaction with the quality and quantity of the food you ate today from 0 (not at all satisfied) to 10 (extremely satisfied).

title: energy
question: How are your energy levels today?
explanation: Rate your energy levels today from 0 (very low) to 10 (very high). This includes any physical or mental fatigue, as well as any factors that may have contributed to your energy levels.

title: outdoors
question: How satisfied are you with the amount of time you spend outdoors?
explanation: Rate your satisfaction ranging from 0 (not at all satisfied) to 10 (extremely satisfied).

title: fitness
question: How satisfied are you with the quality and amount of physical activity today?
explanation: Please rate your satisfaction ranging from 0 (not at all satisfied) to 10 (extremely satisfied).

title: social
question: Were you able to enjoy quality time with people in your life?
explanation: Please indicate if you were able to enjoy quality time with friends, family, or loved ones today by rating your satisfaction ranging from 0 (not at all satisfied) to 10 (extremely satisfied). Also consider any meaningful interactions or activities that you had with others that left you feeling fulfilled and happy.

title: quality time
question: Were you able to practice quality time throughout the day?
explanation: Consider if you were able to intentionally set aside time for yourself today to engage in doing something you enjoy that promotes your physical, mental, or emotional wellbeing by rating your satisfaction ranging from 0 (not at all satisfied) to 10 (extremely satisfied).
